name: LEGAL RIGHTS AND SOCIAL DEVELOPMENT FOUNDATION
briefDescription: Legal Rights and Social Development Foundation is a newly formed NGO in 15/03/2018 and has helped more than 200 people who are mostly uneducated to get their justice by way of different legal procedures,The ignorant,marginalised,poor and downtrodden especially girls and women who were caught in legal complication which includes rape victims also,The NGO has the following Vision and Mission,Vision:  LRSD Foundation is committed to enable vulnerable and marginalized including the poor and downtrodden  to realize their rights, avail resources and opportunities, fight social injustice, capabilities and build a better future for themselves.to a fully democratic society and to ensure that the principles.
